channel.title: Abouts on Gautham Mohanraj
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Gautham Mohanraj

item.title: 🤔 What is my true identity? 🕵️‍♂️🌟
item.description: Hello there! 👋 I’m Gautham Mohanraj, and I hail from the charming town of Mahe. Now, Mahe might raise a few eyebrows—it’s nestled within Puducherry, which primarily speaks Tamil, yet here I am in Kerala’s embrace. 🌴🌊 I learned to code in ninth grade.Back then, coding was just a cool trick to impress my pals. Little did I know, that initial spark would kindle an enduring passion. 🖥️💡 Though my early projects might not have turned heads, each line of code I wrote carried a piece of my enthusiasm.
